TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementBindAttribute extends System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementNewInstanceAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementBindAttribute Inherits ManagementNewInstanceAttribute

Docs.summary: The ManagementBind attribute indicates that a method is used to return the instance of a WMI class associated with a specific key value. Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This is the default constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Schema { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };
member this.Schema : Type with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that defines the type of output that the method that is marked with the ManagementEnumerator attribute will output.
Docs.value: A值，指出方法標示為的輸出型別會輸出屬性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果傳回型別是<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>，然後輸出應視為類型的值<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
